overview:
mailjet_mcp: 8 tools; mailjet_create_contact -> Create contact (with optional name and exclusion status).

    Add a new contact to your Mailjet ..., mailjet_get_account_info -> Get account info (username, timezone, daily/monthly limits).

    Retrieve your Mailjet account p..., mailjet_get_message -> Get message details (status, delivery, tracking).

    Retrieve complete details of a specific se..., mailjet_get_statistics -> Get sending stats (delivered, open/click rates, bounces).

    Retrieve email statistics includin..., mailjet_list_contacts -> List contacts with pagination and metadata.

    Retrieve all contacts in your Mailjet account wi..., mailjet_list_messages -> List messages with pagination and date filtering.

    Retrieve sent messages with optional date ..., mailjet_list_senders -> List verified sender email addresses (status, created).

    Retrieve all verified senders in you..., mailjet_send_email -> Send email (text/HTML, tracking, custom IDs).

    This tool sends a single email through Mailjet...
